title: How To Make Bootable Ghost Usb With Image

forumNotes.author: Jack Reacher
forumNotes.content: I Want To Creat Bootable Ghost Usb With Image Please Tell ?????

forumNotes.author: sbaeder
forumNotes.content:
You should give us a bit more background.

Do you already have a "ghost" image? Or are you trying to make an image backup of an existing system that you can load onto a USB drive and "boot" on another computer? Look around here more, since there are examples already for each type of operation.

Scott
